sentences.en: an attempt to quantify the region’s social and economic decline
sentences.cn: 对该地区社会和经济衰退进行量化的尝试

sentences.en: But it has been hard to quantify the amount.
sentences.cn: 研究发现,目前西伯利亚北部以这种方式排放的沼气每年达380万吨,比原先估计的高5倍.

sentences.en: By contrast intelligence is possibly easier to quantify.
sentences.cn: 相对而言,智力也许比较容易用数量来衡量.

sentences.en: Investigate and quantify the economic consequences of the variation in this function.
sentences.cn: 调查并量化系统功能波动带来的经济损失.

sentences.en: Its effects, however, are not much easier to quantify.
sentences.cn: 然而效果却不如预期想象的那么简单(重译:很难量化).

sentences.en: Objective To quantify the morphologic changes and apoptosis in incompletely ischemic retina.
sentences.cn: 目的观察不完全缺血引起的视网膜形态学变化及细胞凋亡情况.

sentences.en: Quantify all accomplishments with dollar figures or percentages and time periods.
sentences.cn: 将你每个时期的成就用美元或百分比量化出来.

sentences.en: Quantify long - range dependence is a fundamental building block of Internet traffic characteristics.
sentences.cn: 定量刻画网络流量的长相关特性是网络特性研究的重要基础.

sentences.en: The cost of the fire damage is impossible to quantify.
sentences.cn: 这次火灾的损失是无法计算的.

sentences.en: The cost of the flood damage is impossible to quantify.
sentences.cn: 这次水灾的损失是无可估量的.

sentences.en: The risks to health are impossible to quantify.
sentences.cn: 健康的风险是无法用数量表示的。

sentences.en: The scope of the private banking business is notoriously hard to quantify.
sentences.cn: 私人银行业务的规模出了名地难以量化.

sentences.en: Their calculations help to quantify what might have been.
sentences.cn: 他们的评估有助于量化本可能发生的事情.

sentences.en: These disease burdens are difficult to quantify in nutritional terms.
sentences.cn: 这些病患所造成的负担很难从营养角度去加以衡量.

sentences.en: This factor , although difficult to quantify , can be gauged using various metrics.
sentences.cn: 虽然很难去量化, 但可以被用很多指标衡量.

sentences.en: We can quantify these contributions with reference to Fig . 5.
sentences.cn: 我们可以用图5中的参数来定量地表示这些因素的影响.

words.tran_cn: [数][语] 量词；数量词；精于计算的人

trans.tran_en: to calculate the value of something and express it as a number or an amount

trans.tran_cn: 确定…的数量，[逻辑学] 用量词限定
trans.tran_en: to calculate the value of something and express it as a number or an amount
